name: Pac Snowman (Remake)
description:
The first project I ever worked on as a kid, while learning game maker and programming in general, was Pac Snowman.

8 years later, I decided to start learning unity, and Pac Snowman - Remake was born!
Now it is time for you, the players, to start this amazing journey, and play the amazing levels of Pac Snowman 2! A story so amazing, you won't believe your eyes!

Now play the game already before I burn it to the ground. Like, seriously. It's like someone learned to make a cool particle effect and made an entire "game" out of it. The things I have to do to make this thing qualify as an official game...

Anyway, I've also left the original, Pac Snowman 1 available for download. If you manage to beat all 100+ levels that I've made, that's just pretty impressive actually!

Oh, and the controls are just the arrow keys. Good luck, have fun, and burn it to the ground once you've finished with it!
